name: Demo (MetaGems)
description:
MetaGems are the most powerful resources in our metaverse. According to legend, A GodGems was sent from a digital 3.0 parallel world and landed on Earth creating a portal to their World of the Future. These MetaGems have the ability to create sparkling $DUST, a property that forms the basis of our economic ecosystem. (Tokenomics) For the owners (holders) it's to vote decisions by DAO for the future of the metaverse and to earn 10 $DUST per day. - For avatars (next 10K collections) it is to have privileged access and a daily return in cryptocurrency for the various activities to come in the metaverse.

MetaGems is the result of a collaboration between 4 friends with skills in Marketing, NFT’s, Virtual Reality and Digital art. After experiencing hundreds of projects, we have grasped the limitless potential of NFT’s and the MetaVerse. Now we wish to share our vision of our future, and we want you to be part of the changes.
